content.html:
Hello, I'm Colin. You can find out a bit more about me here. This is how you can get in touch:
  • My sole outlet on the web is my blog but that is currently on hiatus while I work out what I want to do with it. When I resume blogging this page will remain and move to the menu.
  • My preferred means of communication is email, I find it is the most effective method for having asynchronous conversations. I try to reply fairly promptly but don't be surprised if there is a delay.
  • I don't publicly advertise my phone number but if you wanted to chat I'm sure we could work something out. Start by mailing me.
  • I have an account on micro.blog and occasionally interact there. If you @ me I'll pick it up eventually.
  • I do not have Twitter, LinkedIn or Instagram accounts, am not on any Mastodon instances, and don't use WhatsApp.
  • While I do have a Facebook account again (long story) I never log in to the service beyond using the Messenger app on my phone to keep in touch with family, so please don't try to contact me there.
    • This is a Hello page inspired by Alastair Johnston. if you have your own site why not create one.
content.value:
Hello, I'm Colin. You can find out a bit more about me here.
						
						This is how you can get in touch:
						
						My sole outlet on the web is my blog but that is currently on hiatus while I work out what I want to do with it. When I resume blogging this page will remain and move to the menu.
						My preferred means of communication is email, I find it is the most effective method for having asynchronous conversations. I try to reply fairly promptly but don't be surprised if there is a delay.
						I don't publicly advertise my phone number but if you wanted to chat I'm sure we could work something out. Start by mailing me.						
						I have an account on micro.blog and occasionally interact there. If you @ me I'll pick it up eventually.
						I do not have Twitter, LinkedIn or Instagram accounts, am not on any Mastodon instances, and don't use WhatsApp.
						While I do have a Facebook account again (long story) I never log in to the service beyond using the Messenger app on my phone to keep in touch with family, so please don't try to contact me there.
						
						This is a Hello page inspired by Alastair Johnston. if you have your own site why not create one.
